idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.0.1324

descript.abstract: This data set consists of digital data for natural monuments in Bulgaria.

citRespParty.rpPosName: Senior expert in Monitoring of Biodiversity, Forest ecosystems and Soils Department

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Dataset contains digital boundaries for 321 Natural Monument (BG03). The column names are: FID, Shape (polygon), Name_ENG (text - 50), SITE_CODE (integer -9), DESIG_ABBR (text - 4).

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntinfo.cntpos: Senior expert in Monitoring of Biodiversity, Forest ecosystems and Soils Department

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

mdContact.rpPosName: Senior expert in Monitoring of Biodiversity, Forest ecosystems and Soils Department

dataLineage.statement: Dataset was created using as basic layer Bulgarian cadastre for 2011. Digital boundaries were converted with software CADIS from Baltic coordinate system (70) into WGS 1984 UTM Zone 35N.
